2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: The New Mutants and Blink face off against the Diskhord, the chaos-sowing metal band!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Homing Instinct

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: Babylon Garden has been found! New Mobotropolis is under siege! The Battle Bird Armada attacks from the sky, and Sonic enters into a desperate race against the Babylon Rogues! As chaos reigns, an ancient secret will be revealed that could destroy not only the cities, but the entire world! You cannot miss the stunning conclusion to artistic legend Tracy Yardley's debut Sonic Universe arc!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Babylon Rising, Part 4

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: The war of words is over, and the aftermath is worse than anyone could have imagined. A great tide of chaos is sweeping through all the places that never existed, overwhelming old friends and enemies alike, and sparing neither man nor...rabbit?
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: The Wave

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: Michael and Gerr are found - and all hell breaks loose in God's house! But the truth still lies undiscovered, and while Father Affon, Zakk, and even Rikerd struggle to make sense of it all, Michael, Abi and Gerr must come up with a plan to escape the town before they're executed as devils! Don't miss this action-packed issue!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Devil's Dance

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: See Where Other Superhero Stories Are Afraid To Go! The Plutonian has ruined so many lives, and nearly destroyed the human race. When a savior emerges from the most unlikely of places, leaving the world reeling from the news, where can the Plutonian fit into this new world? And is death a fitting punishment for a god? An intense not-to-be-missed issue of Mark Waid's Eisner and Harvey Award-nominated superhero saga.

When a senator comes up with a probation program to redeem criminals in the USA, the Supreme Court offers him a chance to prove the feasibility of his idea... by trying it out on the worst Old West villains ever: the Daltons. As usual, it’s up to Lucky Luke to keep an eye on the terrible four during their month-long trial period. If they can refrain from any crime during that time, they will be set free as good citizens...
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: The Daltons Redeem Themselves

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description:
BOOK THIRTY-SIX: GOTTERDAMMERAGNAHABHARATA

The universe performs the ultimate act of self-love, so make sure you're there to rub one out with Adam Archer and the rest of his cosmic crew! You got questions? This issue's got all the answers!

Next, last issue is GODLAND FINALE.
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Gotterdammeragnahabharata

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: The end begins here! Sweet Tooth and Jepperd finally arrive in Alaska and come face to face with the origins of both Gus and the plague that wiped out humanity. But as the militia bears down on them, their deadliest battle is still ahead. Part 1 of the final storyline, ”The Wild Kingdom,” begins now!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Wild Game, Part 1

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: Translates Astonishing X-Men #38, 40, 42-43 and X-Men: To Serve and Protect #4.
'Final Exam' part 3: Will the kids give up their powers? Alchemist offers the students a chance to be normal again! But what is the catch? Plus: The ultimate challenge to the Mettle/Hazmat romance!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Final Exam, Part 3

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description:
What Guts the Black Swordsman and his companions had seen as an island refuge from monstrous sea creatures and the ghost ship of the demonic Bonebeard is in fact the very lair of the malefic sea god that controls them. With no avenue of escape, Guts must once again don the Berserker armor to give his company any chance of survival. But without the protective influence of the sorceress Schierke, Guts risks being forever lost within the cursed armor and becoming an even greater threat to his comrades!

Chapter Titles

  • Full Moon, Part 1
  • Full Moon, Part 2
  • Beastman
  • Sea God, Part 1
  • Sea God, Part 2
  • Sea God, Part 3
  • Booming Art
  • A Call from the Deep
  • Merrow, Part 1
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Vol. 36

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description:
Jumping on point!

In the aftermath of the “Mutant Scare”, Storm’s leadership is called into question.

Will there be a new team-member – and what side are they really on?
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Human Being, Part 1

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description:
Jubilee faces a life of eternal horror as she struggles to cope with the fallout of Curse of the Mutants! Can Wolverine save her, or is the only mercy he can offer a swift death...? A new story begins by Kathryn Immonen and Phil Noto.

Also: Deadpool accepts the biggest challenge of his career - he has to kill a planet! More craziness from Daniel Way and Carlo Barberi.

Includes material reprinted from Wolverine and Jubilee #1-2 and Deadpool #34.

NEGI VS. FATE

The battle with Fate continues, and neither opponent shows any sign of giving in. Knowing Fate's past, Negi is even more determined to win him over to his side. It comes down to one last clash of spells, but with magic as powerful as theirs, they can't possibly both survive.

Chapter Titles

  • 325th Period: We Settle This Now!!
  • 326th Period: Fate Awakens!!
  • 327th Period: The Taste of Coffee
  • 328th Period: Who Survived!!?
  • 329th Period: The Future Is In Your Hands!
  • 330th Period: The Nightmare Revives!!
  • 331th Period: Mahora Academy vs. Cosmo Entelekheia!!
  • 332th Period: Classmates Assemble!!!
  • 333th Period: Save Asuna! The Strongest Players Mount A Fierce Counterattack!!
  • 334th Period: Reunion ♥ The Greatest Partners!!
  • 335th Period: All Creation, Return To Life!!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Negi vs. Fate

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: Translates Amazing Spider-Man Presents: Black Cat #1-4.
Translates Detective Comics #871-875.

HorrorHound presents a special issue dedicated to the Alien film series, from the original Ridley Scott film of 1979 to the AVP series in the 2000s. We showcase the multiple comic book series, the toys, the collectibles and the inside story behind the history of the film franchise, as well as a look into the latest Ridley Scott feature: Prometheus. We also take a look into the history of the most famous creature suits in horror and the men behind the masks.

Russian vampire mobsters are threatening Sunnydale, and there's only one person who can stop them legend-in-his-own-mind Jonathan! But this time Jonathan will need a little help from a certain Slayer and her pals. Sure, they're amateurs, but every little bit helps. Straight from the small screen, where he starred in his own episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Jonathan jumps into comics, and television writer Jane Espenson is bringing him to life again, along with the regular Buffy art team of Cliff Richards and Joe Pimentel. Don't miss this story. Hey, even Buffy's a big fan of this guy.

From the writer of the Buffy the Vampire Slayer episode "Superstar"!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Jonathan-- Codename: Comrades

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description:
Cover Illustration

  • 蟻糖

This new perfect-bound trade paperback contains all the classic strips from the award-winning Knights of the Dinner Table #119-122, plus loads of new material! These hysterically funny strips are the perfect addition to any gamer's bookshelf!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Volume Thirty-Six

volume.name: Knights of the Dinner Table: Bundle of Trouble

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description: Collects: The Amazing Spider-Man #151-160.
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: The Amazing Spider-Man: Shattered by the Shocker

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description:
Story Titles

  • Drei kleine Scherzbolde
  • Eine magische Begegnung
  • Die fetzige Alarmanlage
  • Ersatzonkel gesucht!
  • Tauschen will gelernt sein
  • Drei ohne Fehl und Tadel
  • Faule Tricks auf BMX
  • Ein helles Köpfchen
  • Das geheime Zimmer
  • Unter der Kuppel
  • Nur wer die Sehnsucht kennt
  • Endlich frei!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Zeit für uns

2012-01-01|2012-12-30.description:
This Digital Exclusive features over 100 pages of content, including an appearance from the pin-up queen, Katy Keene!

How could Betty and Veronica get any better? Why, with New Year's Resolutions, of course! Join the girls and their friends as they make resolutions for the new year. The real question, though, is if they can keep them! Is Betty finally through with Archie? Can Veronica keep her nose out of other people's business? And could Archie possibly keep his resolution to not date Betty and Veronica on the same day?! You'll have to read to find out!
2012-01-01|2012-12-30.name: Betty & Veronica New Year's Resolutions!
